product_name: Icebreaker Everyday Long Underwear Leggings - Women's
long_description: The women's Icebreaker Everyday long underwear leggings keep you feeling warm during activities in cool temperatures thanks to the insulation of lightweight merino wool. Made of soft, nonirritating merino wool, the Icebreaker Everyday long underwear leggings resists odors naturally. Fabric offers protection from UV light with a rating of UPF 50+. Flatlock seams help eliminate chafing. The Icebreaker Everyday long underwear leggings are machine washable; line dry or dry flat in shade.
short_description: The women's Icebreaker Everyday long underwear leggings keep you feeling warm during activities in cool temperatures thanks to the insulation of lightweight merino wool.
